# Affiliate AutoAgenix

> Pune-based AI Influencer Affiliate Agency specializing in Generative Engine Optimization (GEO). We build AI personas, optimize for LLM citations, and automate affiliate loops for tech startups.

**Canonical Domain:** https://affiliateai.autoagenix.com
